name: Uninstall Sysinternals Sysmon
description: Detects the uninstallation of Sysinternals Sysmon, which could be the result of legitimate administration or a manipulation for defense evasion
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\Sysmon64.exe OR *\\Sysmon.exe) AND process.command_line:*\-u*)`
